resources.string: This option allows you to replace the domain from which YouTube receives original avatars, images of community publications, etc.
Use alternative domain for all original pictures
The domain to fetch images from.\nNote: Only enter the domain name, i.e., without the \"https\:\/\/\" prefix.
"Tap to mute volume of the current video. Tap again to unmute."
Replaces the domain that is blocked in some regions so that video thumbnails, channel avatars, community post images, etc. can be received.
Press and hold the timestamp to change the Shorts repeat status.
Configure the spacing from the seekbar to the meta panel, between 0-64.
Meta panel bottom margin must be between 0-64. Reset to default values.
